doc.name: SCRModel
doc.description:
An SCR model actor used for requirements specification. For more information about SCR see http://www.nrl.navy.mil/itd/chacs/node/126.

An SCR model is a modal model with a different way of configuring transitions, set and output actions. To view an SCR model as an FSM actor, set the parameter openAsSCRActor to false.
doc.author: Patricia Derler
